name: Granite
description: An igneous rock with visible grains of quartz, feldspar, and mica. Commonly used in construction.

name: Basalt
description: A fine-grained volcanic rock, dark in color. The most common rock type in oceanic crust.

name: Limestone
description: A sedimentary rock composed mainly of calcium carbonate. Often contains fossils.

name: Sandstone
description: A sedimentary rock made of sand-sized mineral particles or rock fragments.

name: Marble
description: A metamorphic rock formed from limestone under heat and pressure. Used in sculpture and architecture.

name: Slate
description: A fine-grained metamorphic rock that splits easily into thin sheets. Used for roofing.
